NAVBAR.TITLE: Guess the Card
HERO.TITLE: Guess the Card
HERO.SUBTITLE: Look at a couple of different emojis that are somehow connected to a Hearthstone card and guess its name.
HERO.MODE.SANDBOX.TITLE: Sandbox Mode
HERO.MODE.SANDBOX.DESCRIPTION: There’s no time limit — you can take as long as you want to guess the card name.
HERO.MODE.SANDBOX.RULES.2: - The card back shows which expansion the card is from.
HERO.MODE.CHALLENGE.TITLE: Challenge Mode
HERO.MODE.CHALLENGE.DESCRIPTION: Same cards, same progress — but you won’t see the card back. You can switch modes at any time.
HERO.MODE.CHALLENGE.RULES.2: - The card back is always the same.
HERO.INFO.1: Leaving the page won’t reset the game. Your score is saved in your browser.
HERO.INFO.2: However, you can always reset your progress by clicking
SANDBOX.TITLE: Sandbox Mode
SANDBOX.GAME.TITLE: The riddle is:
SANDBOX.MODE.SUMMARY.TITLE: Hooray! You did it!
SANDBOX.MODE.SUMMARY.SUBTITLE: You guessed all the cards!
SANDBOX.MODE.SUMMARY.BUTTON.GO_BACK: Go back to the main page
RESET_PROGRESS_DIALOG.TITLE: Do you really want to reset your progress?
RESET_PROGRESS_DIALOG.CONTENT: This action will reset your progress, and you’ll lose all guessed cards. This cannot be undone.
CHALLENGE.TITLE: Challenge Mode
SCORE.TITLE: Score: {score}/100
